description: I would love, for example, to let my GPT-4 powered discord bot access my specific location to get location-specific answers â€“ he just needs a URL to query that will always return accurate results
I want a publicly-accessible API endpoint, with some basic auth, that returns an accurate lat/lon of my position at all times. If Im being tracked already might as well make it useful for myself.
showing my love by not letting the robot touch our correspondence
